Title: Data aspects of the evaluation of demand for emerging transportation systems
Source: Demand for Emerg. Transportation Systems: Modeling Adoption, Satisfaction, and Mobil. Patterns
Abstract: © 2020 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.Of major importance for the evaluation of the demand for emerging transportation systems is the data used. Given the evolution of data availability the last few years, the understanding of the data properties and their characteristics is of major importance. An overview of the data sources commonly used or lately emerging is presented, followed by a classification, based on the component of the transportation system that they represent, aiming at exploring the different benefits and shortcomings of them. A meta-analysis is also performed for the exploration of data quality aspects concerning transport-related datasets.
